regen.absent_element: indication of non-operational periods of the DH System
regen.new_specification: The monthly report shall include details of any non-operational periods of the DigitalHome System, specifying the start and end times of such periods.
The month report shall indicate any non-operational periods of the DH System during that month, including start and end times.

regen.absent_element: situation of non-operational periods of the DH System
regen.new_specification: The monthly report shall indicate any non-operational periods of the DH System and specify the duration and reason if available.

label: The month report shall provide a section that indicates the periods of time when the DH System was not in operation.
absence: indication of periods when the DH System was not in operation
